text: The Ford Taurus X (previously called Ford Freestyle in 2005) was a six or seven passenger crossover SUV that was produced in the United States by the Ford Motor Company. The Taurus X name was phased out in the 2010 model year, and succeeded by the Ford Flex, which overlapped production in the same platform, until it was discontinued. Taurus X Category:2000s automobiles
title: Ford Taurus X
